revised_title: On the Calculation of Attractions and the Figure of the Earth: A Theoretical Study
tldr: The author presents a mathematical analysis of the attraction and figure of the Earth, considering a heterogeneous spheroidal mass of fluid in rotation. The study involves calculating the attraction on a body composed of spheroidal layers and determining the equation of equilibrium for such a mass. The findings contribute to a better understanding of the Earth's shape and gravitational forces.
